ARABIC: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have made ready for the kafirun shackles and chains and a Searing Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have prepared for unbelievers chains and collars and a blazing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: For the unbelievers, We have kept ready chains and fetters and a Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have prepared chains, shackles, and flaming fire (for the disbelievers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We have indeed kept prepared chains, and shackles and a blazing fire for the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We have prepared for the disbelievers iron chains, iron collars, and Sa`ir.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We have prepared for the unbelievers chains and shackles and a burning fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely We have prepared for the unbelievers chains, fetters, and a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We have prepared for disbelievers manacles and carcans and a raging fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [Now,] behold, for those who deny the truth, We have prepared chains, iron collars and a blazing fire, but
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We have gotten ready for the infidels chains and collars and a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed for the faithless We have prepared chains, iron collars, and a blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For the Rejecters we have prepared chains, yokes, and a blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We have prepared for the disbelievers iron chains, iron collars, and a blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, for the unbelievers We have prepared chains, fetters and a Blazing (Fire).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have prepared for the faithless chains, and yokes, and a Searing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:4] We have assuredly prepared for the disbelievers chains, with which they are dragged through the Fire, and fetters, around their necks to which the chains will be attached, and a hell-fire, a fire set ablaze, burning fiercely, in which they shall be chastised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We have prepared for disbelievers) Abu Jahl and his followers (manacles and carcans) in the Fire (and a raging fire.
